Generation III.Ruby: Castform 's appearance changes with the weather. This Pok é mon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
Generation III.Sapphire: Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun, rain clouds, and snow clouds. This Pok é mon 's feelings change with the weather.
Generation III.Emerald: It alters its form depending on the weather. Changes in the climate such as the temperature and humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.
Generation III.FireRed: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.

Generation VI.X: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
Generation VI.Y: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Castform's appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun, rain, and snow-clouds. This Pokémon's feelings change with the weather.

Generation VII.Sun: This is the form Castform takes when covered in snow. Its body becomes an ice-like material, with a temperature near 23 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VII.Moon: This is Castform's form when caught in a hailstorm. Its cold skin is as smooth as ice.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This is the form Castform takes when hit by hail. In an experiment where it was placed in a freezer, it didn't change to this form.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: This is Castform's form when caught in a hailstorm. Its whole body is chilled, and its skin is partially frozen!

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
